dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: The tree just needs this little star up here, and...

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: ... there ya go.
Contracts have been pretty dry these last few days—last few weeks, actually—giving us very little to do in the meantime.
The proxy war contract at H Corp. ended up fizzling out...
... and even the regular jobs have been drying up too, client after client refusing to renew our contract. Or so I'm told.
As a result, the Reindeer Pack's been off the front lines for quite some time now.
The pain brought on by our antlers, the throbbing migraines trailing behind brainwave manipulation, the endless neuroses that'd grip us without ever letting on...
Every pain and agony that had been eating away at us was starting to lose its edge, like the dulling ache of wounds that get covered by scabs and calluses as they heal.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: How's it going over there, Ishy? Is the fireplace coming along nicely?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Haven't even gotten to working on that yet.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Speaking of which—I thought this was supposed to be just a modest celebration? What are we doing with all this?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: C'mon, it's Christmas~

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: We got a turkey roasting inside that T Corp. acceleration oven, and I made sure to lighten the place up with some Christmas candles, too.
It's the most special time of the year, when we all remember to sand down the edges in our words that'd usually prickle each other...
... and surround our hearts with some peace and gentleness, as unfamiliar as they were.
I proposed a Christmas party, certain that no opportunity like this would ever come again should we miss it...
... and with the Pack commander's authorization, we were able to Christmas up our living quarters.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: It is a rather modest celebration though, isn't it?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Maybe for you, Hong Lu.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Ha ha... Haven't you ever been to these Christmas parties before, Hong Lu?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: If you mean parties with a real sense of camaraderie like this one, then no.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Seriously!? What about you, Ishy?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Christmas isn't really my thing, although I've seen quite a few people who like to make a big deal out of it.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Oh. Really? Ha ha ha!

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Wh-what the hell was that? What are you laughing about?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Just how was it with you, Rodion...?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Ah, sorry, sorry.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: I used to be kinda like you in that regard, Ishy.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Christmas, gristlemas, big deal... I thought.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: ... Really? You?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Mhm, didn't care for it. There wasn't much in my old Backstreets to make it a heartwarming occasion, you know.
In Christmastime, the stench of cheap liquor permeated those alleyways instead of the sweet bouquet of top-shelf wine...
And of course, there wasn't so much as a typical Christmas tree to be found anywhere there.
Or there might've been one, but I wouldn't know.
Maybe the biting wind and the hunger boring a hole in my belly swiped away even the bright colors of the tree from my eyes...
... or maybe the Backstreets folks, broke and desperate as always, stole and exchanged it for a handful of cash.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Huh? Then why are you so gung-ho about preparing for this Christmas party?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: I mean, from what you just said... You don't seem to have a very pleasant memory of it.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: I dunno. 'Cuz... Cuz it's a nice day?
Despite everything, I still remember Christmas as a day meant for happiness. And that's because...
... Because of that warmth I once felt, even from the wrong side of the window.
I saw a twinkling little star atop the tree... and on the dining table, a hearty roast turkey, still steaming from the oven's heat.
There was a little kid too, bouncing with excitement and beaming at the unwrapped Christmas gift in his hands, while his family looked on with proud smiles.
Gotta admit, I was jealous. It made me want to spoil their happy little moment if I could, but...
... More than anything, I wanted to be a part of that picture and spend the winter in that pocket of warmth amid the blistering cold.
That desire overwhelmed any sense of jealousy that might've been there.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: That's some pretty half-assed reasoning.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Hey, that's the holidays for you.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Pick an ordinary day that would end like any other, give it a name, and call it special. Right?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: So, yeah.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: That's why.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: If work picks up again, it's back to bouts of neuroses and insomnia.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: When else are we gonna get a chance to feel something like this?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Huh...?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack
dataList.content: ... You've really gone above and beyond with gussying up this place.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Oh, Commander? What're you doin' here? I thought you were busy...?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Wait, I know. Did you wanna celebrate Christmas with us?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack
dataList.content: ... Sorry to be the party-killer, but we've got an urgent task on our hands.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Wh-what?! But you said we could take it easy for a while!

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack
dataList.content: That's what I thought when the contracts we had with the other Wings expired.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack
dataList.content: Anyhow, about the mission: eliminate every guard and researcher within a research facility in the Backstreets of R Corp... and secure their internal files.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack
dataList.content: The problem is that this task will soon be posted as an Urban Nightmare contract for the Fixer Associations.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Ugh...

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack
dataList.content: The payout's enormous—that's why it's been designated an Urban Nightmare...

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack
dataList.content: But the job should be easy enough for even a Grade-5 Fixer Office to handle.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Easy and rewarding—in the City? You sure this isn't bait, Commander?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: *sigh* So... when do we set out?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack
dataList.content: ... Now.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Now?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack
dataList.content: Seven Association's decided to put the intel up for sale in 15—no, 14 minutes from now.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack
dataList.content: It's a simple job with big money. We've got to beat the crowd.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack
dataList.content: It's not far from here, but it wouldn't hurt to get a move on.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: H-hang on, why's it gotta be us? Aren't there plenty of other big-talk Packs you could rope into this?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack
dataList.content: ... Call it a Christmas gift.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: What, so we're supposed to drop everything and head out on Christmas?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: You've gotta be kidding me. Wait, you're serious, aren't you?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: What about the turkey? We can't just leave it in the oven!

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Hahaha...

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: I was wondering where that carol was coming from... Turns out the brainwaves zapped the melody tape to life.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Red lights, green lights... Hah. How very Christmas.
The silver lining, at least...
... was that the contract the Commander landed was a piece of cake, considering the money in it...
So easy that the hardest thing about the mission... was the damn Christmas lights I never got around to untangling from my antlers.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Eeep... I can't untangle these stupid lights!

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Heheh... You look like a walking Christmas tree with your energy powering the lights. It's pretty nice, actually!

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: ... When did you hang that thing on your staff?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Hey, I've got the exact same bell on my staff too... Oh. Guess you didn't get to untie that thing either, Ishy.
The holiday plan's totally botched,
and it really is a far cry (almost astronomically far, even) from the nice and warm Christmas I had in mind...

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: *sigh*

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: But I suppose it does have something festive about it.
The battlefield this time around was an unusually "chill" one.
Since the job was a cakewalk, there weren't any reindeer screaming their lungs out in pain as was often the case...
And only the occasional dying cries of the researchers could be heard every now and then between the sound of jolly carols and jingling bells.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Well... it did end up being a special day, I suppose...

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Special... Ha ha, yeah. This Christmas celebration sure is one of a kind, huh?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Flashy decorations, check.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Christmas tree, check.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Bells and carols, too. Yup, carols. Didn't leave out the carols.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: As for the presents... The commander did "gift" us this holiday gig.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Yeah, sure. I suppose this still counts as a present.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Haha... Yay... Season's greetings and all...

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: All that's missing is the star to top the tree.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Oh. Now that you mention it... Let's see. Star, huh...

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Here! If I focus my brainwaves into my antlers like this...

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: We have our star now!

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Careful, you might end up hurting someone—huh?
Did we let the excitement get the better of us and drop our guard? Or was the trap simply too intricate to notice?
Whichever was the case, Ishy was right. Nothing's ever easy and rewarding in the City.
We should've known better.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Wait, there are too many of them.

The enemy forces were at least 10 times greater than what we were briefed prior to the mission, not to mention how the entire lab was booby trapped to the teeth with all kinds of security contraptions.
It wasn't long before condensed whips of energy began to arc indiscriminately, wreaking havoc through the laboratory.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: ... What the hell is this?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Aren't we allowed to be festive, to be happy... even for a day? It's Christmas. Just one day out of 365...
The Christmas carol slowly begins to cacophonize with the blood-curdling screams.
My vision fills with wildly flashing lights, red and green all over.
I don't hear the jingling bells around me anymore.
All that remains are the blinking lights and the cascading waves of—

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Aggh... Get out of my way... Why won't these fucking decorations come off...?! My head, my head hurts so much!!!

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Guuuh... Get off me...
When I came to, what welcomed me was the sight of half-crazed Ishy with a wild look in her eyes.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: What happened to the others?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Haha... Why are you asking me?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: What the hell... kergh... do you think? Everyone's dead. The mission f-failed... W-we failed... Nnh...

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Then the Fixers who came in after us must've already gotten away with the internal files.
The biting edge in our words that had been sanded down by the holiday mood grows sharp again.
Everywhere I look, my vision is consumed by the gory remains of the slaughter that'd taken place.
I didn't even need to check the time to know that Christmas had officially ended.
And then, I hear it—the unmistakable sound of transmission static cutting between the carol.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Commander?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack
dataList.content: Finally. I've been trying to reach you.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack
dataList.content: What became of the mission?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: F-failed. We were totally outnumbered. There were too many of them, way more than what the briefing said...

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack
dataList.content: ... So you didn't get to unwrap the Christmas present.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack
dataList.content: Ravens will arrive there soon.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: You're gonna... you're gonna have us culled just because of a single failure?

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack
dataList.content: ... Correct. The 4th Reindeer Pack, in its current state, is no longer deemed fit to serve. R Corp. has no need of underperforming units.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack
dataList.content: The order comes from the Supreme Commander. It's final and beyond appeal.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack
dataList.content: Any last words?
Yeah. More than I'll ever get out, unfortunately.
A whole shitload of curses, for starters. I mean, don't I have every right to be pissed about this? Why us, of all people? It's not fair. If I could, I'd yell until my throat gave out.
But then it hits me—beneath all of it, there's just a single thing I actually want to say...
Because keeping it in will hurt more than what's waiting for us.
I swallow whatever migraine meds I had on me, the same meds I'd been saving so I could guzzle some goddamn wine down my throat tonight, and finally say the words I never got to say.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack Reindeer
dataList.content: Merry Christmas.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack
dataList.content: Thank you for your service, Rodion.

dataList.title: R Corp. 4th Pack
dataList.content: Merry Christmas.
